name: Juan Calisaya
title: Software Engineering Student | UPC
resume: Full-Stack Developer with a Backend focus, possessing strong knowledge in web and mobile application development. I'm interested in designing scalable and maintainable software architectures. Passionate about new technologies and teamwork, I aim to build efficient, quality solutions.
aboutDescription: Seventh-semester Software Engineering student at UPC, with solid knowledge in web and mobile application development. Interested in full stack development and designing scalable and maintainable software architectures. Passionate about new technologies and development methodologies, and motivated by teamwork to build efficient, quality solutions aligned with best practices.
experienceDescription: Developed and maintained fullstack functionalities for Contigo Voy with Next.js and Laravel. Supported team management in a pre-professional environment using Trello and GitHub under agile methodology.
